days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Prayer to St. Colette
O blessed Jesus, I dedicate myself to Thee in health, in illness, in all my deeds, so that I may never work henceforth except for Thy glory, for the salvation of souls, and for that which Thou hast chosen for me.
From this moment on, dearest Lord, there is nothing which I am not prepared to undertake for love of Thee.
Amen.
Prayer to St. Colette
O glorious St. Colette, I beseech you through the burning love which inflamed your heart for Jesus in the Most Blessed Sacrament, through the marvelous graces with which He enriched you, and through the loving compassion you did bear to Him in His bitter sufferings, obtain from Him for me my requests which I hope to receive through your powerful intercession.
(mention request here…)

Concluding Prayer

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be
St Colette, pray for us!
